maqras.text: kya hum ne tera sina nahi khol diya
aur tujh par se tera bojh hum ne utaar diya
jis ne teri peet tod di thi
aur hum ne tera zikr bulandh kar diya
pas yaqinan mushkil ke saath asaani hai
beshak mushkil ke saath asaani hai
pas jab tu faarigh ho, to ibaadath mein mehnath kar
aur apne parvardigaar hee ki taraf dil laga
qasam hai anjeer ki aur zaytoon ki
aur toor sineen ki
aur us aman waale shahar ki
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko behetreen surath mein paida kiya
phir ose nicho se nicha kar diya
lekin jo log imaan laaye aur (phir) nek amal kiye to, un ke liye aisa ajr hai jo kabhi qatam na hoga
pas tujhe ab roze jaza ke jhutlaane par kaun si cheez aamada karti hai
kya Allah ta’ala (sab) haakimo ka haakim nahi hai
pad apne rab ke naam se jis ne paida kiya
jis ne insaan ko qoon ke lothde se paida kiya
tu padta reh, tera rab bade karam waala hai
js ne qalam ke zariye (ilm) sikhaaya
jis ne insaan ko wo sikhaaya jise wo nahi jaanta tha
sach moch insaan to aape se baaher ho jaata hai
is liye ke wo apne aap ko be-parvaah ya tawangar samajhta hai
yaqinan lautna tere rab ki taraf hai
(bhala) ose bhi tu ne dekha jo bandhe ko rokta hai
jab ke wo bandha namaaz adaa karta hai
bhala bathla to, agar wo hidaayath par ho
ya parhezgaari ka hukm deta ho
bhala dekho to agar ye jhutlaata ho aur mu pherta ho, to
kya us ne nahi jaana ke Allah ta’ala ose qoob dekh raha hai
yaqinan agar ye baaz na raha, to hum us ki peshaani ke baal pakad kar ghasitenge
aisi peshaani jo jhoti qata-kaar hai
ye apni majlis walo ko bulaale
hum bhi (dozakh ke) pyaado ko bula lenge
qabar-daar! us ka kehna har giz na maanna aur sajda kar aur qareeb ho ja
yaqinan hum ne ise (Qur’aan) ko shabe qadr mein naazil farmaaya
tu kya samjha ke shabe qadr kya hai
shabe qadr ek hazaar mahino se behtar hai
us (mein har kaam) ke sar anjaam dene ko apne rab ke hukm se farishte aur ruh (Jibraeel(alaihissalaam) utarte hai
ye raath saraasar salaamti ki hoti hai aur fajr ke tulo hone tak (rehti hai)
ahle kitaab ke kaafir aur mushrik log jab tak ke un ke paas zaaher daleel na aa jaaye, baaz rehne waale na thein (wo daleel ye thi ke)
Allah ta’ala ka ek rasool jo paak sahife pade
jin mein sahih aur durusth ehkaam ho
ahle kitaab apne paas zaaher daleel aa jaane ke baadh hee (eqtelaaf mein pad kar) mutafarriq ho gaye

unhe us ke siva koyi hukm nahi diya gaya ke sirf Allah ki ibaadath kare, osi ke liye deen ko qaalis rakhe aur Ibraheem haneef ke deen par aur namaaz ko qaayam rakhe aur zakaaath dete rahe, yahi hai deen sidhi millath ka
beshak jo log ahle kitaab mein se kaafir hoye aur mushrikeen, sab dozakh ki aag mein jayenge, jahaa wo hamesha (hamesha) rahenge, ye log badh tareen khalaayeq hai
beshak jo log imaan laaye aur nek amal kiye, ye log behetreen khalaayeq hai

un ka badhla un ke rab ke paas hameshgi waali jannate hai, jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, jin mein wo hamesha hamesha rahenge, Allah ta’ala un se raazi hoa aur ye us se raazi hoye, ye hai us ke liye jo apne parvardigaar se dare
jab zameen puri tarah jhinjod di jayegi
aur apne boojh baaher nikaal phekegi
insaan kehne lagega ke ise kya ho gaya
us din zameen apni sab qabre bayaan kar degi
is liye ke tere rab ne ose hukm diya hoga
us roz log muqtalif jamaate ho kar (waapas) lautenge, ta ke unhe un ke amaal dikha diye jaaye
pas jis ne zarra baraabar neki ki hogi wo ose dekh lega
aur jis ne zarra baraabar buraayi ki hogi, wo ose dekh lega
haankte hoye daudne waale ghudo ki qasam
phir taap maar kar aag jhaadne waalo ki qasam
phir subaah ke waqth dhaawa bulne waalo ki qasam
pas us waqth gardh wa ghubaar udaate hai
phir osi ke saath faujo ke darmiyaan ghus jaate hai
yaqinan insaan apne rab ka bada na shukra hai
aur yaqinan wo khud bhi us par gawaah hai
ye maal ki muhabbath mein bhi bada saqth hai
